H0.text: What is the project/brand name for Google's computerized spectacles. Orb

H1.text: What is the project/brand name for Google's computerized spectacles. Spectra

H2.text: What is the project/brand name for Google's computerized spectacles. EyeMax

H3.text: What is the project/brand name for Google's computerized spectacles. Glass

A4.text: Google Glass, or simply Glass, is a discontinued brand of smart glasses developed by Google's X Development.

A5.text: Google Glass displays information to the wearer using a head-up display.
